GROUP_COORDINATION_COMMAND - Static variable in class it.polimi.rtag.messaging.MessageSubjects
Used by a group leader to coordinate with other leaders of matching groups.
GROUP_COORDINATION_COMMAND_ACK - Static variable in class it.polimi.rtag.messaging.MessageSubjects
Used to reply to a coordination message.
GROUP_CREATED_NOTIFICATION - Static variable in class it.polimi.rtag.messaging.MessageSubjects
A node notify its local universe leader that it has created a new group.
GROUP_DISCOVERED_NOTIFICATION - Static variable in class it.polimi.rtag.messaging.MessageSubjects
When a new node is added to a group leader the group leader inform the new node of the existence of a group.
GROUP_FOLLOWER_COMMAND - Static variable in class it.polimi.rtag.messaging.MessageSubjects
A group follower uses this message either to notify its leader or to communicate with its peer.
GROUP_FOLLOWER_COMMAND_ACK - Static variable in class it.polimi.rtag.messaging.MessageSubjects
A group leader or a group follower which has received a follower command has to reply with its response.
GROUP_LEADER_COMMAND - Static variable in class it.polimi.rtag.messaging.MessageSubjects
A group leader send this message to control its followers.
GROUP_LEADER_COMMAND_ACK - Static variable in class it.polimi.rtag.messaging.MessageSubjects
A group leader receives this message as a response to an issued command.

This class should be customized by the designer according to the application layer.
GroupCommunicationDispatcher - Class in it.polimi.rtag
This class receives all the group communications and forward them to the most suitable GroupCommunicationManager.

Handles the communication of a group and also keep the group descriptor updated.
